thread.title: A.G. Schneiderman Statement On Hawaii Decision Regarding Immigration Ban

author: Anonymous
title: A.G. Schneiderman Statement On Hawaii Decision Regarding Immigration Ban
text: A.G. Schneiderman Statement On Hawaii Decision Regarding Immigration Ban News from Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE New York City Press Office / 212-416-8060Albany Press Office / 518-776-2427 A.G. SCHNEIDERMAN STATEMENT ON HAWAII DECISION REGARDING IMMIGRATION BAN New York Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman issued the following statement: "Today’s order by the federal District Court of Hawaii marks yet another victory for the Constitution and the rule of law. President Trump’s second executive order is just a Muslim Ban by another name – with the same unlawful and unconstitutional goal of discriminating based on religion and national origin. As Judge Watson pointed out in today’s order, the ‘illogic’ of the Trump administration’s policies is ‘palpable.’ I commend my colleague Hawaii Attorney General Doug Chin, and all of the attorneys general who supported his work. My office will continue to aggressively pursue our claims against President Trump’s unconstitutional order, as well as support my colleagues’ efforts, as we work to protect our states’ residents, institutions, and economies." A.G. Schneiderman Releases Report On Voter Complaints During April Presidential Primary Embedded Releases Report On Voter Complaints During April Presidential Primary
